message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time at the price of $150. I believe it will be greatly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.  I believe this product offers significant value, even at this price.
I still think $135 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $125
